advancements.animal_expert-description: Spectate a turtle, panda, llama, parrot, fox and bee through a spyglass, each from at least 25 blocks away
advancements.bad_dreams-description: Go to bed in a jungle temple
advancements.cauldron-description: Get into a cauldron with water while being in nether
advancements.far_lands-description: Travel over 50.000 blocks in the north
advancements.firework_rocket-description: Use a firework rocket with an elytra
advancements.goat_milk-description: Milk a goat with a bucket
advancements.hades-description: Summon a wither in the nether and kill it
advancements.hair_cut-description: Shear a snow golem while it is on fire
advancements.high_totem-description: Use a totem above 300 block height
advancements.i_am_a_pillager-description: Murder one of every villager profession with a crossbow
advancements.lightning-description: Hit a creeper with a channeled lightning
advancements.milehighclub-description: Sleep in a bed at 318 block height
advancements.netherite_pickaxecc-descrip: Have a netherite pickaxe on 1 durability
advancements.now_what-description: Make a pillager break his own crossbow
advancements.nuclear_fusion-description: Strike a creeper, villager, pig and mooshroom with a channeled lightning at once
advancements.painful_fight-description: Kill an elder guardian with a stick
advancements.poseidon-description: Kill a drowned using a trident from at least 45 blocks away
advancements.saveyourdogfromarrow-descri: Kill a skeleton, which is aiming at a dog
advancements.sharp_teeth-description: Let a fox pick up your sword
advancements.snowball-description: Throw a snowball at a ghast
advancements.superman-description: Kill a ravager with your fist
advancements.tank_time-description: Catch every fish in a bucket
advancements.the_cure-description: Drink a bottle of honey to cure poison effect
advancements.tnt-description: Craft TNT from gunpowder and sand
advancements.weird_creature-description: Bred a horse and a donkey
